name: HideandSeek
0:
”Alexa, open hide seek.”
”Alexa, launch hide seek.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hide seek
des:
Have fun playing Hide and Seek with Alexa!

Alexa will describe the setting and available hiding places. Then she will hide! You have three chances to guess where she is hiding! It's great fun!

To begin playing, simply say, "Alexa, open Hide and Seek!"

This is another classic game brought to Alexa enabled devices by wow.lol. Email atwowdotlot@wow.lol if you have any issues or feedback. We would love to hear from you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
